import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchGrades } from "./services/gradeServices" export const TestEditStudent = ({ chosenStudent, editStudentToggle, setEditStudentToggle }) => { const [editedStudent, setEditedStudent] = useState({}) const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const handleEditStudentInput = (event) => { const copy = { ...editedStudent } const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value copy[name] = value setEditedStudent(copy) } const handleEditStudentToggle = () => { setEditStudentToggle(!editStudentToggle) } const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) } const handleUpdateButton = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const copy = {...editedStudent, grade} console.log("ðŸš€ ~ file: TestEditStudent.js:31 ~ handleUpdateButton ~ copy:", copy) } useEffect(() => { setEditedStudent(chosenStudent) handleFetchCalls() }, [chosenStudent]) return ( <> {editStudentToggle ?
: null } ) }
